On Friday, Oracle will pay out roughly $1.4 billion in dividends, even as analysts expect nearly $23 billion in cash burn this fiscal year. On paper, cutting the dividend looks logical. item.title: [NVDA] Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang in Shanghai amid China regulatory headwinds
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is in Shanghai, a person briefed on the matter said ​on Saturday, as the U.S. chip giant faces fierce ‌competition from local rivals and scrutiny from Chinese authorities. The timing of Huang's trip, ‌to kick off annual celebrations with Nvidia's China employees, is routine. He is expected to attend an Nvidia party in Shanghai on Saturday before travelling to Beijing, Shenzhen and then Taiwan, another person with ⁠knowledge of the plans ‌said.

item.title: [GOOG] GE Aerospace Backlog Nears $190 Billion As Airlines Spend Big On Engine Upkeep
item.description: GE Aerospace (NYSE:GE) on Thursday reported strong fourth-quarter 2025 results, reflecting continued momentum across its businesses. It posted total revenue (GAAP) of $12.717 billion, up 18% year over year. Sales of $12.717 billion beat the $11.177 billion estimate, and adjusted EPS of $1.57 beat the $1.43 estimate. Continuing EPS (GAAP) was $2.31, up 32%, and adjusted EPS was $1.57, up 19%. Cash from operating activities was $2.096 billion, up 59%, and free cash flow was $1.760 billion, up 15%.

item.title: [BRH.F] A Winter Storm Is on Track to Hit Insurers. Why the Damage Could Be Huge.
item.description: A major winter storm advancing across the southern and eastern United States this weekend won’t just test municipal snow crews and utility companies’ gridlines. With freezing temperatures, snow, sleet, and ice expected to sweep through millions of households, policyholders will likely file loss reports in the weeks and months ahead, ranging from auto accidents and property damage to burst pipes and roof collapses. Although winter storms are often viewed as less severe weather events than hurricanes or earthquakes, they can lead to meaningful losses for residential and commercial property owners and impact automobiles and infrastructure across a broad swath of the country.

item.title: [LLY0.F] NVIDIA (NVDA) Invests $150 million in Baseten
item.description: NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) is one of the Best Quantum Computing Stocks to Buy for 2026. On January 20, WSJ reported that the company is investing $150 million in Baseten, a startup that specializes in AI inference. Baseten has raised $300 million at a $5 billion valuation. This deal demonstrates NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA)’s aggressive push into […]

item.title: [GOOG] At 22, He's Making $120K And Asks If He Should Buy A Duplex And Continue Living With His Parents. 'I Wanna Make My Money Work For Me'
item.description: A 22-year-old with a $120,000 annual salary turned to Reddit for advice on whether to buy a duplex while continuing to live rent-free with his parents. The poster has already maxed out his 401(k), saved $32,000 in cash, and built up $6,000 in an investment account. “I wanna make my money work for me and make more money,” he wrote on r/personalfinance recently. Redditors Say He’s Crushing It Financially Commenters were quick to praise his financial habits, with many encouraging him to stay with h

item.title: [NVDA] China Signals H200 Purchase Preparations for Alibaba, Tencent, ByteDance
item.description: Regulators gave in-principle approval for talks on Nvidia's H200 orders, with domestic chip buying encouraged as a condition.

item.title: [TSM] Intel’s High-Flying Stock Wasn’t Priced for Reality
item.description: Intel is on pace for its worst selloff in nearly 18 months. Intel was down nearly 17% Friday. The selloff came after the company’s fourth-quarter report made clear that Intel’s turnaround is still a work in progress.

item.title: [GOOG] Alphabet Invests in Japan's Sakana AI to Boost Gemini
item.description: Partnership aims to speed AI adoption in secure sectors.

item.title: [LLY0.F] Eli Lilly Stock Rebounds As Weight-Loss Drug Battle Continues
item.description: Eli Lilly stock has been climbing back from a recent pullback and nearing a buy point. The drugmaker teamed up with Nvidia on a new project.

item.title: [TSM] This Semiconductor Stock Could Be at the Center of the Artificial Intelligence Spending Boom
item.description: Micron is in a prime position to benefit from the increasing demand for high-bandwidth memory.
